title: Resolve relative to digital impersonation and exploitation

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Cyr, a petition (accompanied by resolve, Senate, No. 32) of Julian Cyr that provisions be made for an investigation and study by a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to the potential impacts and legal implications of advanced technology and the internet on protecting individuals from exploitation.  Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

related_entities.name: committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/10/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Accompanied a study order, see S2634
